events.message: Candidate submitted application for the Software Engineer role, highlighting strong backend development experience and proficiency in Java and Python.
Application reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to focus on software development skills and relevant technical background.
Recruiter assigned to candidate to manage the hiring process and communicate next steps for the engineering position.
Initial phone screening completed where candidate demonstrated solid understanding of software engineering principles and architectural design.
Candidate responded affirmatively to proceed with the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the project teams and technology stack.
Technical interview scheduled for the candidate with our lead developer to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability in real-time.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent coding abilities and clear communication about complex engineering challenges.
HR interview scheduled to discuss cultural fit, company values, and logistical details such as compensation, benefits, and start date.
